column4: Would anyone know what I can't click on VNC option in the drop down box for Terminal Server Client?
can you if you run it with gksu?
Do I have to restart or anything?
what system do you have installed?
then sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop to install it
hmmm. Interesting. How was that uninstalled? So I can avoid this again.
no idea, remember to read the screen when playing with packages so you know whats in and whats out
